scripts.watch: npm run pre-watch && parcel watch src/background.js src/options.jsx src/popup.html --dist-dir dist --no-hmr
scripts.build: npm run pre-build && parcel build src/background.js src/options.jsx src/popup.html --dist-dir dist --no-source-maps && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-locales && npm run copy-static && npm run post-build
